content: pattern copyright by caron international posted on this site only by special permission from caron for charity purposes do not repost anywhere else without permission from caron pattern was originally on some skeins of caron cuddlesoft yarn i e-mailed caron asking permission to post the pattern on my site since it was not on the caron web site and was given permission to do so pattern works well with any soft yarn note 3/27/2011 fignations com is currently undergoing construction and the pattern is not currently available there the link provided is the archived link at archive org 12/10/13 updated link to new link at fignations com 6/26/15 updated link after site redesign
